0.text: Innate: When LeBlanc is damaged to  40% maximum health, she creates a controllable  clone of herself, after which they both instantly become  invisible for 1 second.

1.text: The clone can basic attack but deals no damage, lasts for 8 seconds, and starts running 1900 units towards a random place in front of LeBlanc decided the moment it spawns.

2.text: Mirror Image can only occur once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc projects an orb at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and marking them for 3.5 seconds upon arrival.

1.text: Leblanc's next damaging ability against the marked target will consume the mark to deal them the same damage again.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc  dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. Distortion can be recast after 0.2 seconds of the dash ending for its duration.

1.text: Recast: LeBlanc  blinks to Distortion's return pad, regardless of range.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction that latches onto the first enemy it hits, dealing them magic damage and forming a  tether between LeBlanc and the target for 1.5 seconds, during which the target is  revealed.

1.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt magic damage and is  revealed and  rooted for 1.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of her most recently used basic ability, applying the same effects and dealing modified magic damage.

1.text: Mimic Sigil of Malice: Deals modified damage and double damage upon triggering the mark.

3.text: Mimic Ethereal Chains: Deals modified damage and double damage upon rooting.

1.concerningText: Active: LeBlanc projects an orb at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and marking them for 3.5 seconds upon arrival.
Leblanc's next damaging ability against the marked target will consume the mark to deal them the same damage again.

2.concerningText: Active: LeBlanc  dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. Distortion can be recast after 0.2 seconds of the dash ending for its duration.

3.concerningText: Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction that latches onto the first enemy it hits, dealing them magic damage and forming a  tether between LeBlanc and the target for 1.5 seconds, during which the target is  revealed.
If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt magic damage and is  revealed and  rooted for 1.5 seconds.

4.concerningText: Mimic Ethereal Chains: Deals modified damage and double damage upon rooting.

1.concerningText: Leblanc's next damaging ability against the marked target will consume the mark to deal them the same damage again.

0.concerningText: Active: LeBlanc  dashes to the target location, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon arrival and leaving a return pad at the cast location for 4 seconds. Distortion can be recast after 0.2 seconds of the dash ending for its duration.

Active: LeBlanc flings an illusory chain in the target direction that latches onto the first enemy it hits, dealing them magic damage and forming a  tether between LeBlanc and the target for 1.5 seconds, during which the target is  revealed.

1.concerningText: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is dealt magic damage and is  revealed and  rooted for 1.5 seconds.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
Corrupting Potion can be used even at full health and mana.
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.208 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 125 health and 75 mana. During this time, basic attacks and damaging abilities against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved for area of effect and damage over time effects.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage to your target and launches bolts at up to 3 enemies near them, dealing them the same damage, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
